short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy multiple texts from multiple tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CopyCat is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily copy text from multiple paragraphs and different tabs. With a sleek material design interface and responsive design, it makes text copying hassle-free and efficient. Try CopyCat today and streamline your text copying workflow!

You can select which texts to paste from the side-panel if you don't want to paste all. You can also customize the list by deleting the texts using the delete button in the side panel.

Ctrl+Shift+C to copy
Ctrl+Shift+X to clear list
Ctrl+V or right click -> paste to paste
